mapper.insert: insert into indent (indent_id, consignee_name, consumer_name, contact_number, deliver_address, indent_build_time, indent_oldprice, indent_payment_way, indent_payprice, indent_state, logistic_fee, logistic_number, logistic_way, postcode, user_id, consumer_remark) values (#{indentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indentBuildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{indentOldprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{indentPaymentWay,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{indentPayprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{indentState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{logisticFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{logisticNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logisticWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consumerRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update indent set consignee_name = #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumer_name = #{consumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliver_address = #{deliverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, indent_build_time = #{indentBuildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, indent_oldprice = #{indentOldprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, indent_payment_way = #{indentPaymentWay,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, indent_payprice = #{indentPayprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, indent_state = #{indentState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, logistic_fee = #{logisticFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, logistic_number = #{logisticNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logistic_way = #{logisticWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consumer_remark = #{consumerRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where indent_id = #{indentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select indent_id, consignee_name, consumer_name, contact_number, deliver_address, indent_build_time, indent_oldprice, indent_payment_way, indent_payprice, indent_state, logistic_fee, logistic_number, logistic_way, postcode, user_id, consumer_remark from indent where indent_id = #{indentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select indent_id, consignee_name, consumer_name, contact_number, deliver_address, indent_build_time, indent_oldprice, indent_payment_way, indent_payprice, indent_state, logistic_fee, logistic_number, logistic_way, postcode, user_id, consumer_remark from indent
